tools.name: Playwright
tools.description: Browser automation and testing via Playwright. Interact with web pages through structured accessibility snapshots.
tools.author: microsoft

tools.name: Filesystem
tools.description: Secure file operations with configurable directory access controls.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: Memory
tools.description: Knowledge graph-based persistent memory system for retaining context across sessions.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: Fetch
tools.description: Web content fetching and conversion for efficient LLM usage.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: Git
tools.description: Tools to read, search, and manipulate Git repositories.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: Sequential Thinking
tools.description: Dynamic and reflective problem-solving through structured thought sequences.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: PostgreSQL
tools.description: Read-only PostgreSQL database access for querying and schema inspection.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: Brave Search
tools.description: Web and local search using the Brave Search API.
tools.author: modelcontextprotocol

tools.name: Web App Testing
tools.description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, and capturing screenshots.
tools.author: anthropic

tools.name: MCP Builder
tools.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services. Covers Python (FastMCP) and TypeScript (MCP SDK).
tools.author: anthropic

tools.name: Frontend Design
tools.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
tools.author: anthropic

tools.name: Doc Co-Authoring
tools.description: Structured workflow for co-authoring documentation, proposals, technical specs, decision docs, and similar content.
tools.author: anthropic

tools.name: Algorithmic Art
tools.description: Create algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration. For generative art, flow fields, and particle systems.
tools.author: anthropic

tools.name: Agent Evaluation
tools.description: Testing and benchmarking LLM agents including behavioral testing, capability assessment, reliability metrics, and production monitoring
tools.author: vibeship-spawner-skills

tools.name: AI Agents Architect
tools.description: Expert in designing and building autonomous AI agents. Masters tool use, memory systems, planning strategies, and multi-agent orchestration.
tools.author: vibeship-spawner-skills

tools.name: Skill Creator
tools.description: Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Web Design Guidelines
tools.description: Review UI code for Web Interface Guidelines compliance. Checks accessibility, design best practices, and UX patterns.
tools.author: vercel

tools.name: Social Content
tools.description: Social media content creation, scheduling, and optimization for LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook with platform-specific strategies and templates.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Secret Guard
tools.description: Blocks commits and file writes that contain API keys, tokens, passwords, or other secrets.
tools.author: community

tools.name: TODO Tracker
tools.description: Logs a reminder after any file write that introduces a TODO, FIXME, HACK, or XXX comment.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Test Watcher
tools.description: Reminds you to update or create tests when source files are modified.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Console Log Guard
tools.description: Warns when console.log, print(), or debug statements are added to production code.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Large File Warning
tools.description: Warns when a file being written exceeds 500 lines, suggesting it may need splitting.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Dependency Change
tools.description: Reminds you to run install after package.json, requirements.txt, or other dependency files change.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Scaffold Feature
tools.description: Scaffold a new feature with source file, test file, and exports following project conventions.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Write Tests
tools.description: Generate thorough unit tests for a given file, matching the project's testing framework and patterns.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Review Code
tools.description: Perform a focused code review on a file or directory, checking for bugs, security issues, and improvements.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Explain Codebase
tools.description: Generate a concise architectural overview of the project or a specific subsystem.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Create Migration
tools.description: Create a database migration file following the project's migration framework and naming conventions.
tools.author: community

tools.name: Refactor File
tools.description: Analyze a file for refactoring opportunities and apply targeted improvements.
tools.author: community

tools.name: ACK Import Guard
tools.description: Enforces .js extensions on all relative imports in TypeScript files, required for ESM compatibility in ACK.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Path Guard
tools.description: Blocks hardcoded file paths in ACK source code -- all paths must use ClaudeCodePaths constants.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Throw Guard
tools.description: Warns when throw statements appear in ACK parser files -- parsers should return error-status NormalizedTool instead.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Raw FS Guard
tools.description: Warns when raw fs.writeFile or fs.writeFileSync is used instead of FileIOService atomic writes.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Scope Exhaustive
tools.description: Warns when switch statements on ToolType or ConfigScope are missing a default case for exhaustive checking.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Conventional Commit
tools.description: Validates that commit messages follow conventional commit format (feat:, fix:, refactor:, etc.).
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Add Parser
tools.description: Scaffold a new parser for the ACK extension following the adapter pattern and error-handling conventions.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Add Service
tools.description: Scaffold a new service for the ACK extension with dependency injection, Result types, and test boilerplate.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Validate Patterns
tools.description: Audit the ACK codebase for pattern violations: import extensions, path hardcoding, parser throws, raw fs writes.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Add Tree Command
tools.description: Add a new VS Code command to the ACK tool tree with handler, package.json registration, and menu contribution.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Add Tool Type
tools.description: Walk through adding a new tool type to ACK: enum, parser, writer, schema, adapter routing, and tests.
tools.author: koenrohrer

tools.name: ACK Debug Tool Loading
tools.description: Debug why a specific tool isn't appearing or loading correctly in ACK by tracing the full read pipeline.
tools.author: koenrohrer
